name: Last Hope (itch) (WizardMike)
description:
A strange snowstorm falls upon the world through unknown means, as you woke up from hibernation. You promise that you will banish the cold and free this land from the cold.

Controls:

-The fire spirit follows your mouse cursor, hover to guide the fire spirit through obstacles and terrains

-There are totems that keeps the cold at bay,  reach them to reactivate them

-Avoid getting caught by enemies in the cave

Credits:

Pixel Art: A friend of mine ( didn't want to be credited )

Code/Music: Me

Sound Effects: Freesound.org
